title: GD I just need to share this. This guy's voice is amazing.
body:
I just stumbled across this video by pure accident on youtube.

I haven't been brought to feel this many emotions listening to ANY song before. It's been a hell of a long time. I actually almost cried, it just was so powerful.

Just shh, quiet, and give it a shot. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K3GhMJHt-lM
